thread.title: Italy's Mediaset signs pay-TV deal with Sky Italy unit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Italy's Mediaset signs pay-TV deal with Sky Italy unit
text:
MILAN, March 30 (Reuters) - Italy’s private broadcaster Mediaset said on Friday it reached a deal with Sky’s Italy unit to broadcast part of its pay-TV channels on the group’s satellite platform.
The agreement will also allow Sky Italia to use Mediaset’s Premium pay-TV digital platform for its own offering of services, a statement said.
Mediaset added that the accord gave the Milan-based TV group, controlled by the family of former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi, to hand over to Sky Italia the control of a new company to which the assets of its pay-TV Premium would be transferred. (Reporting by Giulia Segreti, editing by Larry King)
